content.title: Cleanse (action)
content.units: One or more units from your army within range of an objective marker that is not within your deployment zone.
content.completes: End of your turn, if the unit performing this Action is still within range of the same objective marker and you control that objective marker.
content.ifCompleted: That objective marked is **cleansed** by your army.

text: One objective marker was **cleansed** by your army this turn.
Two or more objective markers were **cleansed** by your army this turn.
